title: Reasons to Live at the Seasons!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'THE COMMUNITY', "The Seasons of Cherry Creek is a premier community with three individual buildings  - each with it's own personality.", 'Our newest tower, Seasons 2 GREEN building, offers one bedroom + den through three-bedroom floor plans.', 'These apartments have GREEN features that focus on sustainability and are designed to be 15% more energy efficient.', 'Also, the apartments feature upscale amenities like an in-home washer and dryer, gas fireplace, 5-piece master bathroom, a gas grill located on every balcony and so much more!', 'Our two South Towers  offer studio through two-bedroom floor plans, which have been remarkably upgraded with modern appliances, updated fixtures and open layouts.', 'Also, Seasons 1 buildings feature a 30-machine on-site laundry facility for the resident’s to utilize 24-hours a day.', 'THE NEIGHBORHOOD', 'You’ll find The Seasons of Cherry Creek apartments standing amid the world-class shops and restaurants.', 'No matter which apartment option you choose, you’ll be amazed by the attention to detail you’ll find in each living space.', 'Points of Interest:', '•\tTwo blocks from the famed Cherry Creek Mall', '•\tMinutes to 1-25 and downtown Denver', '•\tClose to DU and CU Denver', '•\tMinutes to Public Transportation', '•\tWalk to great restaurants and shops', '•\tEasy access to Denver Tech Center', '•\tClose to Cherry Creek Biking Trail', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pets allowed: Dog, Cats & BirdsMaximum: 2 Pet Fees:Dogs: $400, Rent: $40 per monthCats: $200, Rent: $25 per monthPet Exclusions except with proper documentation: Dobermans, Rottweilers, Pit bulls, Staffordshire Terriers, Wolf-hybrids, Chow, Akita, German Shepherd, Ferrets/Rabbits, Amphibians of any type.', ' No weight limit.', 'Deposit:', '$200-$500', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'The Seasons offers 2-13 month lease terms.', 'Please call us about any questions.', 'Application fee:', '$14 per person', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities
